alert.note: Alert for Lee; Russell (Alabama) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 5:48PM CDT by NWS Birmingham
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of central Lee and Russell Counties through 630 PM CDT... At 548 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Opelika to 7 miles south of Seale. These storms were nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Auburn, Opelika, Russell County Sports Complex, Uchee, Seale, Beans Mill, Ladonia, Beauregard, Bleecker, Griffen Mill, Robert G. Pitts Airport, Hatchechubbe, Uchee Creek, Fort Mitchell, Ladonia Sports Complex, Marvyn, Fort Mitchell Activity Center, Phenix Drag Strip, Mount Jefferson and Parkmanville. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with these storms. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
